itunes:title: The One Where We Tell You What We're Currently Reading & What Does Mood Reading Actually Mean?
title: The One Where We Tell You What We're Currently Reading & What Does Mood Reading Actually Mean?
description:
In Episode 12 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are bringing you a current read roundup! They share what they're loving lately, their latest reads, their shelf additions, and have book talk about a few of their current reads they haven't shared anywhere else plus what mood reading means to each of them.

*Support us on Patreon ! We would love for you to join our Book Talk community! We have great bonus content including bonus episodes, Zoom get togethers, an engaging private Facebook group to interact with other listeners and more for just $5 a month!Â 

Â *The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!


Â Loving Lately
4:06 Elizabeth Barnhill (IG @Wacoreads)
Fabled Bookstore in Waco, Texas
Currently Reading Podcast
Thoughts From A Page Podcast
SarahsBookShelvesLive Podcast
10:35 Lindsey @BringMyBooks (Trello Highlight on IG)

12:38 Book Talk: Mood Reading

Latest Reads
30:36 All Together Now |Matthew Norman
33:50 The House in the Cerulean Sea |TJ Klune
38:15 For Your Own Good |Samantha Downing
42:29 While Justice Sleeps |Stacey Abrams
46:14 Dark Roads | Chevy Stevens
Still Missing | Chevy Stevens
52:00 The Perfect Family | Robyn Harding
56:00 Someone We Know | Shari Lapena
The Couple Next Door |Shari Lapena
An Unwanted Guest |Shari Lapena
1:00:49 The Pact | Sharon Bolton

Shelf Additions
1:05:00 Sister Stardust| Jane Green
My Sweet Girl | Amanda Jayatissa

Other Mentions
Fierce Kingdom | Gin Phillips
The Good Lie |A.R. Torre
